input.sentences: [male] [female] was playing with her toys as always .
being goofy at the camera is her thing .
she held on to the book shelf .
suddenly she stood up by herself for the very first time .
daddy is so proud of his little girl . he ca n't believe how quickly she 's growing .
output.sentences: As a daddy to my little girl, watching her play is one of the highlights of my day.
The way she smiles and giggles when she discovers something new just lights up my life.
She is learning how to use the bookshelf to pull herself up.
Suddenly, for the first time she stands the rest of the way up!
I am such a proud father, she is growing up so fast.
